abilities.name: Cursed Glare
abilities.effect: As long as Cacturne ex is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't attach any Special Energy cards (except for Darkness and Metal Energy cards) from his or her hand to his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Spike Rend
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.
